text: Maurice Faure (2 January 1922 - 6 March 2014) was a French politician and diplomat. He was a member of the French Resistance and a minister in several French governments. He was born in Azerat, Dordogne. Faure died on 6 March 2014 in Cahors, Lot. He was 92 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Maurice Faure at the European Parliament Category:1922 births Category:2014 deaths Category:French diplomats Category:French people of World War II Category:Government ministers of France Category:MEPs for France Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:People from Dordogne
title: Maurice Faure
